summary: GoogleWrapperSample throws Illegal State exception on second instantiation of Google Map view

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Build the wrapper sample project, go from OSM to Google view twice. Second time round get "You are only allowed to ave a single map view in a map activity " Easy work round to put in an instance variable and check for null before instantiating in setMapView() Just raised it for info really, otherwise nice demo
I'm aware of the error, but keeping an instance of it after it's no longer needed doesn't seem like a good idea.
